Text: Finally, a DC comic worth reading.
MM82, thanks for your many UL's, and this one especially.
thanks mirrormaster82. so very glad to see this series back!

@BruceWayneJr  There are plenty of DC comics worth reading, but I doubt you've given them a chance.
Swamp Thing, Animal Man, The Movement, I Vampire, Justice League Dark, Aquaman, etc.
Agreed, not a DC fan either.

i like The Movement so far, but this is the only other print series i'm buying from them now. i love their digital-first series -- injustice and adventures of superman being the best of those IMHO.

in general DC has lost the creative steam it had in late 2011 and early 2012.
